headline: Is It Time To Reassess CrowdStrike (CRWD) After Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: If you are wondering whether CrowdStrike Holdings is still worth the price you see on your screen, this breakdown will help you connect the current share price to what the business might be worth. headline: Zscaler posts wider quarterly loss on higher spending; shares down 9%
summary: Zscaler on Thursday posted a wider net loss in the second quarter, citing higher spending on sales, marketing, ‌and research and development in a competitive market, sending shares of ‌the cloud security firm down roughly 9% in extended trading. The results come when IT budgets remain ​tight and clients spend cautiously on large deals amid economic uncertainty, even though cybersecurity budgets face less pressure than general capital outlays. Zscaler provides cloud-based zero trust security, which is designed to eliminate the need for legacy firewalls and virtual private networks (VPNs) ‌by authenticating each connection rather ⁠than granting broader network access.

Zscaler provides cloud-based zero trust security, which is designed to eliminate the need for legacy firewalls and virtual private networks (VPNs) ‌by authenticating each connection rather ⁠than granting broader network access.
